The Democracy Project: A History, a Crisis, an Movement bụ akwụkwọ onye odee akwukwo bù  David Graeber dere n’afọ Puku abuo Na iri na ato  (2013), n'ime akụkọ banyere Occupy Wall Street
Graeber na-enyocha mmalite nke mmegharị ahụ, isi iyi nke ịdị irè ya, na ihe kpatara njedebe ya
Interspersed bụ akụkọ ihe mere eme nke ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya, ma kpọmkwem ma na-apụtaghị ìhè, n'ọtụtụ oge na ebe dị iche iche
N'adịghị ka ọtụtụ nyocha ndị ọzọ nke OWS, Graeber na-ewere ụda dị mma, na'ịkwado ma uru nke oWS na usoro ya nke ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya. Spiegel & Grau bipụtara akwụkwọ ahụ.
